summary: This bill, the North Pacific Research Board Enhancement Act, aims to improve the operations of the North Pacific Research Board. It amends the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act of 1998, specifically section 401(e). Key changes include adding a member representing Alaska Natives with expertise in subsistence uses, defining term limits for certain board members, and potentially increasing the administrative expense cap under specific funding circumstances. Additionally, it waives the 15% cap on administrative funds for five years.
